name: Vinik along
description:
This is 'Vinik along', a new video game from Outhouse Media. It is released September 10th in the UK.
The trailer features April, a female character in the game who looks like a hippie-turned-idealist named Crockett (pictured at right) who is trying to convince her brother Vinik to join the band. April states that she is responsible for "the good people" which bangs home the point that the band is just a bunch of hippies. "No that's the name of the album, remember," she says to Crockett. The duo then run away from Vinik and make their way to the Black Rock resort where they meet May (pictured at left). She soon says that she doesn't believe in God, but looks for them when they meet her friend Mary (pictured at right). "Here, just take Jesus," she says to May. May speaks to May, explaining that she is looking for people who share the same beliefs as she does. "Go with me, I'll use you for information," May says as she retreats into the wilderness. A few scientists from a research outfit will follow May, and May will then meet up with Crockett, in her role as 'Professor'." Crockett will then give some vague philosophy lessons about the concept of inspiration, and pointing out that the concept of inspiration is a lot like religion.
